title: Teemo is love

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body:
Diamond

27/0/3 masteries

1 crit red, 8 M. Pen, 9 armor, 9 AP, 3 MS quints

Doran's blade start+hp on minion kill mastery+Dangerous game+hp pots = sustain

Go any lane

Feed every game

Shrooms 

Use passive

Do most damage to champions in every single game because Laundry's is broken on Teemo

Win by feeding

/l
